title: How to Make a Quesadilla
description:
Learn how to make a quesadilla with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-a-Quesadilla

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/wikihow/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wikihow
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
subtitles: to make a quesadilla first heat half a teaspoon 2.5 milliliters of butter or olive oil in a non-stick pan over medium-high heat spread the butter or oil around in the pan so the whole bottom of the pan is covered then place a tortilla in the pan fill the tortilla with 1 cup 100 grams of shredded mexican blend cheese let the cheese cook until it melts then fold the tortilla in half over the cheese press down on the tortilla to compress the cheese and let it cook for one to three minutes until the bottom is brown and crispy then flip the quesadilla over and cook the other side for another one to three minutes finally cut your quesadilla into wedges and enjoy with sour cream or salsa for a veggie quesadilla use half a cup 50 grams of cheese and add roughly half a cup around 50 grams of diced onions tomatoes mushrooms black beans or any combination of veggies you'd like for a savory meat based quesadilla pan fry a small steak or chicken cutlet then cut the meat into thin one inch two and a half centimeter strips add the strips to your quesadilla along with the cheeseto make a quesadilla first heat half a teaspoon 2.5 milliliters of butter or olive oil in a non-stick pan over medium-high heat spread the butter or oil around in the pan so the whole bottom of the pan is covered then place a tortilla in the pan fill the tortilla with 1 cup 100 grams of shredded mexican blend cheese let the cheese cook until it melts then fold the tortilla in half over the cheese press down on the tortilla to compress the cheese and let it cook for one to three minutes until the bottom is brown and crispy then flip the quesadilla over and cook the other side for another one to three minutes finally cut your quesadilla into wedges and enjoy with sour cream or salsa for a veggie quesadilla use half a cup 50 grams of cheese and add roughly half a cup around 50 grams of diced onions tomatoes mushrooms black beans or any combination of veggies you'd like for a savory meat based quesadilla pan fry a small steak or chicken cutlet then cut the meat into thin one inch two and a half centimeter strips add the strips to your quesadilla along with the cheese to make a quesadilla first heat half a teaspoon 2.5 milliliters of butter or olive oil in a non-stick pan over medium-high heat spread the butter or oil around in the pan so the whole bottom of the pan is covered then place a tortilla in the pan fill the tortilla with 1 cup 100 grams of shredded mexican blend cheese let the cheese cook until it melts then fold the tortilla in half over the cheese press down on the tortilla to compress the cheese and let it cook for one to three minutes until the bottom is brown and crispy then flip the quesadilla over and cook the other side for another one to three minutes finally cut your quesadilla into wedges and enjoy with sour cream or salsa for a veggie quesadilla use half a cup 50 grams of cheese and add roughly half a cup around 50 grams of diced onions tomatoes mushrooms black beans or any combination of veggies you'd like for a savory meat based quesadilla pan fry a small steak or chicken cutlet then cut the meat into thin one inch two and a half centimeter strips add the strips to your quesadilla along with the cheese

title: How to Make a Roux
description:
Learn how to make a roux with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-a-Roux

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/wikihow/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@wikihow
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
subtitles: a roux is a mixture of equal parts fat and flour you can add a roux to a sauce or soup to improve the flavor and thicken the texture of the dish to make a roux first choose the fat you'd like to use like butter bacon fat pork drippings margarine or shortening heat the fat in a non-stick skillet over medium heat until it melts then add an equal amount of all-purpose flour whisk the flour into the fat until the texture and color become uniform how long you cook the roux depends on the color of the roux required for your recipe cook the roux for two to five minutes to make a white roux which will thicken your dish without adding a lot of flavor for a blonde roux cook the roux for six to ten minutes or until it's a light brown color a blonde roux will add a toasty flavor to your food cook the roux for 15 to 30 minutes if you're looking for a medium brown roux which has a hearty flavor that's ideal for gumbo or soup for a dark roux with a deep like flavor heat the roux for 35 to 45 minutes when the roux is done add it to the dish you're cooking you can store any unused roux in the fridge for up to one weeka roux is a mixture of equal parts fat and flour you can add a roux to a sauce or soup to improve the flavor and thicken the texture of the dish to make a roux first choose the fat you'd like to use like butter bacon fat pork drippings margarine or shortening heat the fat in a non-stick skillet over medium heat until it melts then add an equal amount of all-purpose flour whisk the flour into the fat until the texture and color become uniform how long you cook the roux depends on the color of the roux required for your recipe cook the roux for two to five minutes to make a white roux which will thicken your dish without adding a lot of flavor for a blonde roux cook the roux for six to ten minutes or until it's a light brown color a blonde roux will add a toasty flavor to your food cook the roux for 15 to 30 minutes if you're looking for a medium brown roux which has a hearty flavor that's ideal for gumbo or soup for a dark roux with a deep like flavor heat the roux for 35 to 45 minutes when the roux is done add it to the dish you're cooking you can store any unused roux in the fridge for up to one week

title: How to Make a Simple Cheese Sauce
description:
Learn how to make a simple cheese sauce with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-a-Simple-Cheese-Sauce

subtitles: to make a simple cheese sauce start by melting some butter in a pan on the stove top then whisk some flour into the butter until it's fully blended next slowly pour in milk stirring constantly until the mixture thickens when it does remove the sauce from the heat stir in some shredded cheese and serveto make a simple cheese sauce start by melting some butter in a pan on the stove top then whisk some flour into the butter until it's fully blended next slowly pour in milk stirring constantly until the mixture thickens when it does remove the sauce from the heat stir in some shredded cheese and serve

title: How to Make a Smoothie
description:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make a fruit smoothie first pour 1 cup 240 milliliters of fruit juice milk or non-dairy milk into a blender you can even use water if that's all you have then add half a cup 120 milliliters of yogurt finally add 2 cups 300 grams of frozen fruit and blend on high until smooth pour your smoothie into a glass and enjoy if you don't have frozen fruit use fresh fruit instead and add one cup 150 grams of ice to make a delicious mango pineapple and kiwi smoothie start by adding 1 cubed mango 1 diced Kiwi in one cup 200 grams a cubed pineapple to a blender then add 1 cup 240 milliliters of milk and 2 cups 475 milliliters of plain Greek yogurt blend on high speed for a few minutes and enjoyto make a fruit smoothie first pour 1 cup 240 milliliters of fruit juice milk or non-dairy milk into a blender you can even use water if that's all you have then add half a cup 120 milliliters of yogurt finally add 2 cups 300 grams of frozen fruit and blend on high until smooth pour your smoothie into a glass and enjoy if you don't have frozen fruit use fresh fruit instead and add one cup 150 grams of ice to make a delicious mango pineapple and kiwi smoothie start by adding 1 cubed mango 1 diced Kiwi in one cup 200 grams a cubed pineapple to a blender then add 1 cup 240 milliliters of milk and 2 cups 475 milliliters of plain Greek yogurt blend on high speed for a few minutes and enjoy

title: How to Make a Whiskey Sour
description:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make a simple whiskey sour combine whiskey lemon juice powdered sugar and a handful of ice in a cocktail shaker cover the shaker and shake the drink for at least 10 seconds to fully blend the ingredients strain the ingredients into a rocks glass and garnish with a slice of lemon if you prefer sweet flavors you can garnish the drink with a maraschino cherry insteadto make a simple whiskey sour combine whiskey lemon juice powdered sugar and a handful of ice in a cocktail shaker cover the shaker and shake the drink for at least 10 seconds to fully blend the ingredients strain the ingredients into a rocks glass and garnish with a slice of lemon if you prefer sweet flavors you can garnish the drink with a maraschino cherry instead to make a simple whiskey sour combine whiskey lemon juice powdered sugar and a handful of ice in a cocktail shaker cover the shaker and shake the drink for at least 10 seconds to fully blend the ingredients strain the ingredients into a rocks glass and garnish with a slice of lemon if you prefer sweet flavors you can garnish the drink with a maraschino cherry instead

title: How to Make an Easy Sponge Cake
description:
Learn how to make an easy sponge cake with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-an-Easy-Sponge-Cake

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make an easy sponge cake preheat the oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit and coat a pan with butter use an electric mixer to beat two large eggs whisking in one cup of granulated sugar add 0.25 cups of cold water or milk and sift one cup of flour into the mixture whisking to combine mix two teaspoons of baking soda into the batter to help leaven the cake and pour the batter into the buttered pan bake for 30-35 minutes and remove the cake from the oven let it cool for 15 to 20 minutes before removing it from the panto make an easy sponge cake preheat the oven to 375 degrees fahrenheit and coat a pan with butter use an electric mixer to beat two large eggs whisking in one cup of granulated sugar add 0.25 cups of cold water or milk and sift one cup of flour into the mixture whisking to combine mix two teaspoons of baking soda into the batter to help leaven the cake and pour the batter into the buttered pan bake for 30-35 minutes and remove the cake from the oven let it cool for 15 to 20 minutes before removing it from the pan

title: How to Make an Egg Wash
description:
An egg wash helps your pastries, pies, and other baked goodies really stand out with a gorgeous golden browning, and even a bit of shine. It also keeps toppings in place. This quick video will give you some tips on #howto make an easy, perfect egg wash!

Read more: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-an-Egg-Wash

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make an easy egg wash for cooking and baking crack an egg into a bowl and add one teaspoon of milk cream or water to the egg whisk the egg and liquid together with a fork or a whisk for 10 seconds until it is combined completely you can add spices or seasoning to the egg wash according to your cooking needs if you need more egg wash for recipes that expand as they bake like pastries or bread you can thin the wash with one to two teaspoons of waterto make an easy egg wash for cooking and baking crack an egg into a bowl and add one teaspoon of milk cream or water to the egg whisk the egg and liquid together with a fork or a whisk for 10 seconds until it is combined completely you can add spices or seasoning to the egg wash according to your cooking needs if you need more egg wash for recipes that expand as they bake like pastries or bread you can thin the wash with one to two teaspoons of water

title: How to Make Apple Cider Vinegar
description:
Learn How to Make Apple Cider Vinegar with this guide from wikiHow: https://www.wikihow.com/Make-Apple-Cider-Vinegar

Follow our social media channels to find more interesting, easy, and helpful guides!

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wikiHow/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wikiHow
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wikihow/
subtitles: to make apple cider vinegar first cut some apples into small chunks until you have enough to almost fill a quart sized liter sized sterilized jar you can use any kind of apple and don't worry about removing the cores seeds or stems once the jar is nearly full in a separate bowl combine two tablespoons 25 grams of raw cane sugar and 2 cups 500 milliliters of water stir until the sugar dissolves pour the sugar water into the jar until the apples are completely submerged add more water if necessary since the apples can mould if they're exposed to the air now cover the jar with something breathable like cheesecloth or a coffee filter and secure it with a rubber band as the apples ferment they'll release gases and a breathable cover will allow these gases to escape store the jar at room temperature in a dark place for three weeks and check on it every day to make sure the apples aren't exposed or molding after three weeks strain out the apple chunks transfer the liquid back to the jar and cover it again finally store the apple cider vinegar in a dark room temperature spot for three to four more weeks stir the vinegar every few days until it's readyto make apple cider vinegar first cut some apples into small chunks until you have enough to almost fill a quart sized liter sized sterilized jar you can use any kind of apple and don't worry about removing the cores seeds or stems once the jar is nearly full in a separate bowl combine two tablespoons 25 grams of raw cane sugar and 2 cups 500 milliliters of water stir until the sugar dissolves pour the sugar water into the jar until the apples are completely submerged add more water if necessary since the apples can mould if they're exposed to the air now cover the jar with something breathable like cheesecloth or a coffee filter and secure it with a rubber band as the apples ferment they'll release gases and a breathable cover will allow these gases to escape store the jar at room temperature in a dark place for three weeks and check on it every day to make sure the apples aren't exposed or molding after three weeks strain out the apple chunks transfer the liquid back to the jar and cover it again finally store the apple cider vinegar in a dark room temperature spot for three to four more weeks stir the vinegar every few days until it's ready
